summary: Working on LISA, a major insurance domain application.
highlights: Developing frontend features using Vue.js with TypeScript.
Implementing real-time functionalities (live agent status, ring groups) using SignalR.
Integrating Redis caching and Twilio SMS services for enhanced performance.
Developed a Business Workflow Management System in ASP.NET MVC.
Implemented role-based user management and automated bulk import/export workflows.
Designed responsive internal dashboards for process tracking.
